titleStmt.title: Prosodic Patterns to be Encoded in Editions

publicationStmt.authority: DHARMA Project (ERC 809994): The Domestication of “Hindu” Asceticism and the Religious Making of South and Southeast Asia (2019–2025).

licence.p: This work is licenced under the Creative Commons Attribution 2.0 Unported Licence. To view a copy of the licence, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, USA.

abstract.p: List of all the prosodic patterns used in the epigraphic and manuscript-based editions produced by the DHARMA project.

revisionDesc.change: Adding references to Apte's appendix and some tidying
Adding bibl and seg @type="gana" and changing note for label
Creation of the file, adding some informations and minimal metadata

table.head: Prosodic notation in XML code (@type="xml") and conventional symbols (@type="prosody")

row.cell: two morae (one long or two short syllables)
boundary of odd and even quarter
